pos: nouns which may take the genitive case particle 'no'

lessons.japanese: 教授は期末試験を一週間延期すると約束した。
lessons.indonesian: Our professor promised to hold off on the final exam for another week.

lessons.japanese: 期末試験の勉強で忙しかったのです。
lessons.indonesian: I was busy studying for the term exam.

lessons.japanese: 期末試験の結果は決して満足のいくものではなかった。
lessons.indonesian: The results of the term examination were anything but satisfactory.

lessons.japanese: 期末試験のために、一生懸命勉強しなくてはいけない。
lessons.indonesian: I have to give myself up to study for my final exams.

lessons.japanese: 期末試験に備えて本当に気合いを入れて勉強しなきゃ。
lessons.indonesian: I've really got to buckle down and study for our final exams.

lessons.japanese: 期末試験が近づいているので忙しい。
lessons.indonesian: I'm busy because the finals are drawing on.

lessons.japanese: 期末レポートをホワイト教授に提出せよ。
lessons.indonesian: Submit your term papers to Professor White.

lessons.japanese: 期末レポートははかどってますか。
lessons.indonesian: How is your term paper coming along?

lessons.japanese: 学生たちは期末レポートを提出した。
lessons.indonesian: The students turned in their term papers.

lessons.japanese: 学期末テストが近づいている。
やっと期末試験が終わった。
lessons.indonesian: At last, the end-of-term exams are over.

lessons.japanese: たいていの学生は期末試験の準備をしている。
lessons.indonesian: Most students are preparing for the term examination.

lessons.japanese: ジムは期末試験のため猛勉強をしている。
lessons.indonesian: Jim is studying hard for his finals.

lessons.japanese: あと２週間で期末試験だ。
lessons.indonesian: Final exams are two weeks from now.
